description:
The narrator of the story. He`s a middle-schooler, and the class rep for 2nd year homeroom C. After discovering that http://anidb.net/ch39362 [Muryou] and http://anidb.net/ch39365 [Kyouichi] have astonishing powers, he decides to keep track of all the strange events that start to unfold - but he soon finds himself more deeply involved than he bargained for. Hajime is very social, mature for his age, and adjusts well to even the most bizarre situations.
Source: shingu.rightstuf.com
name: Murata Hajime
